text: Facundo Mena (born 22 September 1992) is an Argentine tennis player. Mena has a career high ATP singles ranking of 195 achieved on 16 September 2019. He also has a career high doubles ranking of 216 achieved on 2 March 2020. Mena has won 1 ATP Challenger singles title at the 2019 Città di Como Challenger, defeating Andrej Martin in the final. ==Tour titles== {| class=wikitable !
